"Rod User Post-Newbie":
"<%me>!
I've finally gotten used to calling you by your
real name! But my request this time's going to be a
tough one. I want you to complete the "Lost
Sea Mineral Transport" mission using rods only, and
do it fast! It'll probably be a little tough for a
post-newbie such as yourself, but give it a try!
*Using rods only, complete the request
within 20 minutes and earn an S Rank
on Hard difficulty or above."

"来た、<%me>！
よーやく名前で呼ぶのも慣れてきたわ！
今回の課題はきっついわよー！
長杖だけで、貴重物資運搬計画：砂漠を
さくさくっとクリアしてみせてよ！
まー、へっぽこぴーだったアンタには
ちょーっと厳しい課題だと思うけどねー。
ま、やれるもんならやってみなさいな！
※長杖系限定
ハード以上、２０分以内、Ｓランククリア"
